message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm open to negotiating further if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product holds for you.
